SENT.plain: Excessive sweating of the face and, to a lesser degree, of the thorax and limbs, occurred after basilar artery occlusion in a 15 year old Saudi boy
Magnetic resonance imaging (MRI) showed a limited bilateral paramedian infarction of the rostral ventral pons
Basilar artery occlusion in children and adolescents is a rarity
Excessive sweating following such a stroke is rare in any age group
